string.text: Message:
Anonymous
I'd like to exchange some currency. %c[d_orange][Exchange]
Who are you?

Do you just go around and ask random people who they are? Alright, if that's so, I'm Williams Heades, people call me "Ashes". I oversee imports from western countries for Mercenaries. I've been in the Zone for a while now, and business has never been this good.
So you're the one who imports all those goods into the Zone? I've seen other traders in the Zone with imported goods, do they also import them?
No, most of them get it through me. It's a real pain to get this many goods into the Zone, but as Mercenaries, we have the necessary resources to get it done.
I see. So you do business with anyone?

Well you know how we are. If you pay good money, we can always find an agreement. I don't believe in most of the Zone's bullshit anyway. I take no part in these wars faction wage to each others. So long as you're not a total dumbass, we can make business together.
Alright.
Could one of your helicopters drop me somewhere?
Sure, that's the least I can do for you! Where would you like to go?
Actually, never-mind.
Limansk, south of the construction site. %c[d_orange][Free]
Great Swamps, at the observation outpost. %c[d_orange][Free]
Cordon, south-east of the railway bridge. %c[d_orange][Free]
Darkscape, on the plateau. %c[d_orange][Free]
Deadcity, at the mercenary base. %c[d_orange][Free]
Red Forest, next to the Forester's cabin. %c[d_orange][Free]
Jupiter, at the cooling tower. %c[d_orange][Free]
Zaton, near the old barge. %c[d_orange][Free]
Deserted Hospital, by the collapsed entrance. %c[d_orange][Free]
You need to pay for the selected items (with Euros or Dollars).
You haven't selected anything to buy.
You need to give, in cash, an equal or great value to what you're buying.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]Flight recorder%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]300 EUR%c[ui_gray_2].
The trader is not looking to purchase this item for now. Come back later.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]Flight recorder%c[ui_gray_2] for an %c[d_orange]RPG-7%c[ui_gray_2].
The trader only had one RPG-7 to exchange.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]Flight recorder%c[ui_gray_2] for three %c[d_orange]OG-7V warheads%c[ui_gray_2].
The trader is out of warheads for now, come back later.
The trader want to keep some change for other clients, come back later.
Exchange five %c[d_orange]10 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]50 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]50 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill for five %c[d_orange]10 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange two %c[d_orange]50 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]100 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]100 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill for two %c[d_orange]50 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]100 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill for ten %c[d_orange]10 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange ten %c[d_orange]10 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]100 USD%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange five %c[d_orange]10 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]50 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]50 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill for five %c[d_orange]10 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange two %c[d_orange]50 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]100 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]100 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill for two %c[d_orange]50 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange a %c[d_orange]100 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill for ten %c[d_orange]10 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills.
Exchange ten %c[d_orange]10 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bills for a %c[d_orange]100 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] bill.
Exchange %c[d_orange]10 USD%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]700 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Exchange %c[d_orange]50 USD%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]3500 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Exchange %c[d_orange]100 USD%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]7000 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Exchange %c[d_orange]10 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]680 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Exchange %c[d_orange]50 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]3400 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Exchange %c[d_orange]100 EUR%c[ui_gray_2] for %c[d_orange]6800 RU%c[ui_gray_2].
Hi. I'm looking for information.
Yeah? What kind exactly?
I've heard some rumors are going around the place about "strange lights"? Do you know anything about that?
Oh yeah, everyone here does. You know the Container Warehouse, south of here? I don't know what's going on there but a few nights ago it was a real firework.
Do you know what these lights could be? Perhaps an anomaly?
I'm not sure. And to be honest, I'm not sure if I want to know either.
Alright. Thanks.
How come you are even talking to me yet?! We're supposed to meet in act 1, task 3. I'll send you to Brazil be careful !
Uhh... Wh-wh...
Wha-what's... going on?
Where are you... taking me?
We should get moving, I don't like staying here...
Good to see you again.
Hey friend, I'm happy to see you!
Hey, you're still with us? Get hold of yourself, and come with me, fast!
Hmm. Wh-who are you?
A scout team spotted you some time ago, I'm getting you out of here.
My head...
Come on! We don't have a lot of time before the Monolith squads nearby will call for reinforcements. Come!
Hey, Heades said you wanted to see me?
Yes. I wanted to personally thank you for coming to my rescue. You know, these days it's hard to find people that don't take the opportunity to screw over others when they can.
I'm just not that kind of person. I'm glad I made it in time before the Monolith could brainwash you.

Yeah, tell me about it! Anyway, I wanted to give you a little something, to make my thank just a little more than a word.\n \nHere, take this. It's an artefact my friends and I found when we last went hunting. I can't believe they are all dead... An artefact isn't exactly the same as saving a life, but I heard it's quite valuable.
Thank you.
At least we meet.
Hello young Padawan.
Hello.
Hi.
What do you want, Stalker.
What is it?
Yes?
What do you want?
My head... my head!
Identify yourself!
Shhh! It's... It's here...
What is here?
You're transporting something I need.
This case? Why do you want it?
I'm just a contractor. Hand it to me, slowly.
You know, I value my life more than this research...
Who are you?
I'm Oleksandr. Thank you for not shooting me on sight. People are crazy these days...
Please, don't kill me. We're all just trying to survive in this mess, alright? I'm Oleksandr.
What is a soldier doing down there?
What are you doing down there? Kuznetsov didn't inform us of any deployment here.
I'm not a soldier anymore. Screw the army! We're just cannon fodder to their eyes... My brother and I should have never enrolled for this mess.

I'm not a soldier anymore. I deserted. Yes, I know what you're thinking, but here me out. The army doesn't care about us. One day or another, they'll send you on a suicide mission too, just like they did with me and my brother...
So what are you doing here then?

I'm here to represent Dushman's interests at the Flea Market. I'm trying to keep a low profile, that's why I'm staying in this basement. People don't really like Mercs over here. Although I've never had too much troubles so far.
Interesting. So what can you offer?

I basically sell packages of stuff we have too much of. I'll offer you a discount, but offers don't last forever. Grab it while you still can! Haha, just kidding. But in all seriousness, offers are limited, it helps people make their choice, so they don't bother me all day.
I see.
Who are you?!
Hello.
Hi.
What do you want, Stalker.
What is it?
Yes?
What do you want?
Alright, let's talk.
You want to talk? Sure. Your little friend has been at it for days. You're wasting your time. I'm not telling you anything.
All I want is information. You'll be fine if you cooperate, you have my word for it.
Just tell me what I need to know, alright?
Listen, you tell me what I want to know, you live. I'll let you guess what happens if you don't.
What do you want to know anyway?
And what do would you *need* to know anyway?.
Get fucked.
For starters. Who's after Danylo?
What I need to know is who sent you after Danylo.
Who do you work for? You have 10 seconds to answer. 10, 9, 8, 7, 6...
For starters. Who's after Danylo?
What I need to know is who sent you after Danylo.
Who do you work for? You have 10 seconds to answer. 10, 9, 8, 7, 6...
For starters. Who's after Danylo?
What I need to know is who sent you after Danylo.
Who do you work for? You have 10 seconds to answer. 10, 9, 8, 7, 6...
Look, I don't know who the order came from. But if the SSU is involved, your friend must have enemies in really high places.
Who sent me... What do you think am I, a Merc? I follow orders, that's it.
Fuck man, who do you think I work for?! Are you this blind you can't read my uniform?
The SSU? Why would they care so much Danylo to send a squad after him?
So you're a soldier? Why is the Army after him?
And what uniform is that, the Army? No, better. The SSU. Why does the SSU want from Danylo?
The SSU? Why would they care so much Danylo to send a squad after him?
So you're a soldier? Why is the Army after him?
And what uniform is that, the Army? No, better. The SSU. Why does the SSU want from Danylo?
The SSU? Why would they care so much Danylo to send a squad after him?
So you're a soldier? Why is the Army after him?
And what uniform is that, the Army? No, better. The SSU. Why does the SSU want from Danylo?
Look, I don't know why our squads got orders. I promise I don't know. Half of the order we got was already redacted before we got it. It's a miracle we even found your friend.
What do you think? I don't know why these orders were sent. All I know is our squads got orders to find him.
Mind your fucking business. Hell, I couldn't even tell you if I wanted to. The orders our squads got were covered in black ink anyway.
Squads? There are more people out there looking for him? Look, tell me where I can find them, and you'll be free. Deal?
Squads? You're not the only one looking for him? Where can I find them?
Squads? Now that's interesting. Enough playing, tell me where I can find the other squad, or I put a bullet in your pretty face.
Squads? There are more people out there looking for him? Look, tell me where I can find them, and you'll be free. Deal?
Squads? You're not the only one looking for him? Where can I find them?
Squads? Now that's interesting. Enough playing, tell me where I can find the other squad, or I put a bullet in your pretty face.
Squads? There are more people out there looking for him? Look, tell me where I can find them, and you'll be free. Deal?
Squads? You're not the only one looking for him? Where can I find them?
Squads? Now that's interesting. Enough playing, tell me where I can find the other squad, or I put a bullet in your pretty face.
Ok... Look, you'll find them in Zaton, by the old barge. They should be... Three or four maybe, if The Zone was nice to them.
Ok... I'll tell you. Just... Don't kill me, please. You'll find them in the north-east of Zaton.
Fine. Jesus... You'll find them in the east of Zaton, that's all I know.
Does the name 'Danylo' ring a bell?
Why are you asking?
So it does ring a bell. How about I slide %s RUB your way, and you just, forget about him?
Why would I do that?
Let's just say he's looking to move on from his past. You forget about him, he forgets about you.
Yeah? Alright, but he better forget about everything, or else I'll send the entire Ukrainian army after him.
Do you have any offers?
I have this set of items at -%s% off.
What do you say?
Are you taking?
Interested?
Deal?
Are we making a deal?
I have nothing else for the moment.
Sorry, those offers expired.
Special Offer - %s%sh %sm%c[default] remaining

%c[default]Items:%c[250,255,232,208] %s
 %c[default]Item count:%c[250,255,232,208] %s
 %c[default]Discount:%c[250,255,232,208] %s-%s%
 %c[default]Price:%c[250,255,232,208] %c[d_orange]%s RUB
%c[d_orange]%s RUB%c[default]?
I'll take it.
Deal.
Alright, I'm buying.
Here.
Sold.
Do you have anything else?
I don't have enough money, do you have anything else?
Sorry, I don't have that money. Do you have anything else?
I can't afford this, do you have anything else?
Never-mind.
I want to purchase a few things. %c[d_orange][Trade]
Sure thing.
Take a look.
Here's what I've got.
Is there anything I can help you with?
I can do that.
Actually, let me think about it.
Don't wander around for too long, they should be there soon.
Alright, I'll go now.
Oh and before I forget, take this. It'll help you find the LZ.
Thanks.
I'm back, and I have the supplies.
How are things?
Could be better...
How's that?
Consider it done.
Sorry, I'm busy with other things at the moment.
Thank you, contact me if you discover anything.
I went to Jupiter, to investigate the rumors.
Good, did you find anything?
There was a group of Bandits at the Container Warehouse. They had this rifle and I also found this note.
Is there any work you'd want done?
Monolithians again... I'm on it.
I can't help you with that for the moment, sorry.
Thank you, and please, keep me posted.
I'm back, your copilot should have been dropped-off here by now?
Do you have any special jobs up for the taking?
Deal.
I'll think about it.
Alright, get back to me when you have the artefact.
I found the artefact your client wants.
For sure.
You know, never-mind.
Good, they'll contact you soon.
Why did you not sell the artefact for money then? I thought you wanted to prove yourself...
I've changed my mind, can you tell your client I'm looking for more work?
What are you, bipolar? I'll be nice with you this time, and relay your message. Make sense of yourself next time.
So you're the "anonymous" contact I've been talking with?
Yes. We're trying to keep a low profile. We don't want to telegraph our presence.
I see. Well, I have what you asked for.
Good. Goes to show working with local stalkers can prove... Useful. I understand you don't work for free, so here, take this.
Thanks.

As I understand you're quite reputable around here?
 
Listen to this then. We're setting up an operation here. I cannot give you details yet, but, I'll contact you in a few days when we have made progress with our preparations.
 
If you're looking for more work, come and meet us. I'll tell you where to look for us then, we won't be staying here for much longer.
Alright.
You said you were in the Army with your brother? Where is he now?
I don't know, actually. He went to meet a new supplier a few days ago, and he didn't come back. I'm worried something might have happened to him.
Is there something I can do to help?
I see. Sorry to hear about it.

Well. I could use some help. I'm stuck here managing the Flea Market. Dushman won't appreciate if I leave, even for my brother.
 
Thing is, I don't know where the meeting with the supplier was. My brother is good at his work, I don't usually question what he does.
 
Listen, if something bad really happened, and if he survived it, he must have found a place to hide. Back when we were in the Army, we kept a stash in the Agroprom Underground. I doubt he'll be hiding there, but it could give us a lead. Here, take this, it'll help you find out stash.
I need to access data on a USB pendrive. Can you help me with it?
Sure, but I'll need %c[d_orange]5000 RUB%c[default] for this.
Ok, here.
Let me think about it...
Alright... There is a lot of encrypted stuff... There's a map, could this be what you need? I'll upload it to your PDA.
I could ask you the same question. Are you Danylo Chernenko, Oleksandr's brother?
H-How do you know that?
Your brother asked me to find out what happened to you. He said you've been missing for days.
Thank god... I thought you were here to kill me. Listen, I'm trying to stay away from my brother for the moment. There are people after me, I don't want him to get dragged into this mess.
Who is your prisoner?

This guy? I don't know. He and his squad ambushed me when I was out to meet a new supplier for my brother's business. These bastards didn't even try to talk, they went straight for a shoot out. He's the only one that survived this bloodbath... And me, of course. I've been trying to get him to talk for days, but he won't spill the beans on who sent him and for what reason.\n \nListen, I'll need to get moving soon, it's only a matter of time before they find out I'm hiding here. Try to get him to talk, would you?
I'm on it.
I need time to prepare.
I killed the SSU squad in Zaton, here's a document one of them had.
Let me see. Interesting, this is a deployment notice. The order was given from... This bastard. I knew it!
Can I help?

When I was in the Army, one of our supervisors was corrupt to the core. One day, I managed to catch evidence of a shady deal he sealed with bandits, selling outfits we had just received from command. I showed it to my brother, and that and the fact my brother outranked him gave us decent protection against his bullshit.\n \nI guess us deserting gave him the perfect opportunity to have the army itself help him silence us. Listen, I know this guy, who won't do the dirty work himself. Last time I heard about him, he was deployed in the Great Swamps, at the Machine yard. This will never end if he's still around, so... Get rid of him, would you?
I'll let you know when it's done.
I can't help you with this yet.
Your old supervisor won't cause you troubles anymore.
Right... I knew this guy was rotten, but I didn't think he'd actually use the Army to cover his ass.
Anyway, you said you needed help with something?
Oh, yeah... About that... See, I'd like to go back to my brother, in the Garbage... But the way there isn't exactly welcoming, especially for a Merc. Can you just, help me get there?
Sure, let's go.
Actually, I need time to prepare before we go.
Thanks, I'll let you lead the way.
I have return, and I didn't come alone.
Thank you so much Stalker. I was growing worried. Good to know you're someone reliable. Hey, take this, for your trouble, and for getting my brother back in one piece.
You made it to the helicopter?
Yes, but there's no-one here. The helicopter is landed in the middle of nowhere.
Where's the crew?
I don't know. Do you have any way to locate them or the supplies?
Some of the supplies have a GPS tracker, let me check.
I have a signal active at the sawmill, not far from you. Get over there, double time!
I've located the crew... They are all dead. It seems they tried to take cover in a house... And got overwhelmed by zombies.
They are all dead? Damn it. Can you see any of the supplies?
I think I see a transport case.
Only one? There should be a lot more! Doesn't matter. Take what you can and get the hell out of here before the zombies get you too!
I found someone at Yanov station. He said he saw strange lights coming from the Container Warehouse.
Hm. The helicopter flew over that area when we lost contact with the crew.
I'll make my way there, see what's going on.
The helicopter, is operational again. I'll send it over to your location to assist you. We don't have a lot of fuel left, so make the best of it.
We're in route to your location. Heades said you might need some covering fire. Just designate the targets (press: %c[d_orange]%s%c[ui_white]), and we'll take care of the rest.
We're running now on fuel. We'll return to the Waste Processing Station. Good luck out there.
What are you doing, stealing our stuff. Dumb ass.
Stealing our stuff? I'll tell the boys who you really are.
Be advised, multiple Bandit squads moving in to your position.
We're running now on fuel. We'll return to the Waste Processing Station. Good luck out there.
Target acquired.
Roger that.
Solid copy.
Opening fire.
Stand clear.
Heades, I found the captured merc. He's shaken, but alive.
Good. Can you escort him back to the Book Store?
He is really confused, I doubt he'll even be able to fire a gun. The Book Store isn't exactly close to our position...
Can you get to the bridge, in the Red Forest? I'll arrange the helicopter to go pick him up.
That would work. Have the helicopter stand by, I'll tell you when to send them to our location.
H-how... How d-did you find me again?
Heades told me a scout team found you when they were looking for enemy movements and safe air corridors for his helicopters.
Are you feeling better?
Yeah I'm... I'm alright. My memory is a bit fuzzy...
You remember who you are at least? I hope these Monolithians didn't have time to start working on you.
Yeah no don't worry. I remember. I'm copilot for one of Heades' helicopters.
Wait, you said you're a copilot? How come Heades didn't notice you were missing?
I don't know... All I remember is, we were flying some cargo to the Water Processing Station in Zaton, and we had to land in emergency...
You're the copilot of the helicopter I found abandoned in Zaton?! You just forgot to mention that?
Sorry I'm still a bit confused. Anyway, I'm probably still alive because those Monolithians wanted me to fly one of their own helicopters.
The area is safe enough. You can send the helicopter over.
Roger that, we're on our way. Hang tight.
Be careful, you're getting close to the school. If people see you get there, we'll have to abort the mission.
Someone saw you get in the school. Mission aborted.
You left your position? We cannot take chances, mission aborted.
You made it to the Outskirts? Good. Advance to the school, instructions will follow.
I made it to the school, what now?
Find the lobby, there will be stairs leading to the basement. Hide there, while the convoy arrives.
The convoy will arrive soon. When it does, get to the third floor of the school.
What do you want me to do when I'll see them?
Get rid of their escort, but not before we give you the signal. We'll tell you when to open fire.
Understood.
Be advised, a group of bandits is approaching. Don't intervene yet, we don't know if the convoy has the documents.
... you... copy? We're trying to amplify our signal. The convoy fled. We have a GPS signal active at the old service center.
If you receive this, I'm on my way there.
10-4. We have confirmation the convoy is carrying the documents. You have green light to engage.
I've got the documents.
Good. Meet us in the Darkscape. We'll be waiting for you at the camp, under the cliff.
%s, I have to move. My current location isn't safe anymore. Meet me in the Red Forest, at the old mine.
Alright, I'll meet you there.
The supervisor won't cause you troubles anymore. The Zone got the best of him.
Thank god. This is finally over. Listen, can you help me with one last thing? I'll be waiting for you in the Army Warehouses.
The supervisor shouldn't cause you troubles anymore. I slide some cash in his pockets.
That's not what I wanted, but hopefully that'll do the trick. Listen, can you help me with one last thing? I'll be waiting for you in the Army Warehouses.
